content_profile.title: How To Monetize A YouTube Audience | Dylan Jardon & Henry Belcaster

key_takeaways: Solution: Use attractive people to teach nerdy subjects (Difficulty: beginner)
Solution: Focus on other revenue streams, use shorts for brand building (Difficulty: intermediate)
Growth Tactic: Combine attractive people with educational content (Channel: viral)
Growth Tactic: Use short-form content for discoverability (Channel: content)
Strategy: Hot creator arbitrage - connect attractive creators with brands

startup_ideas.title: Hot creator educational content company
startup_ideas.target_market: Nerdy guys aged 25+ interested in business/finance
startup_ideas.problem_solved: Boring educational content, attractive creators not monetizing properly
startup_ideas.business_model: Subscription/paywall model, brand partnerships, agency model
startup_ideas.validation: Create TikToks, test traction on short-form platforms

startup_ideas.title: Attractive creator agency/arbitrage business
startup_ideas.problem_solved: Brands can't find/connect with attractive creators efficiently
startup_ideas.business_model: Pay creators $250-500, charge brands $10k for bundles
startup_ideas.validation: DM creators, test response rates and pricing
startup_ideas.estimated_investment: Low - just need to pay creators upfront
